languages.text: "Все просто. Кто воспримет всерьез бедного несчастного скомороха? Кто обратит на него внимание? В шутовском колпаке мои руки были развязаны, и я смог всецело посвятить себя подготовке к нашему... финальному аккорду. А чтобы замести следы своей маленькой шалости..."

traits.locale_text: "Маски всегда нравились мне больше этих рож". {n}Неопределенный жест Блефа явно адресован копошащейся внизу на площади толпе.{/n} "К тому же... кто воспримет всерьез бедного несчастного скомороха? Кто заподозрит?"
"Все просто. Кто воспримет всерьез бедного несчастного скомороха? Кто заподозрит? Вопрос риторический".

languages.text: "It is simple: Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath this fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our... grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my little mischief..."
languages.original_text: "Все просто. Кто воспримет всерьез бедного несчастного скомороха? Кто обратит на него внимание? В шутовском колпаке мои руки были развязаны, и я смог всецело посвятить себя подготовке к нашему... финальному аккорду. А чтобы замести следы своей маленькой шалости..."

traits.locale_text: "It is simple. Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath the fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our…grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my tiny mischief…"

"It is simple: Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath this fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our... grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my little mischief..."

"I have always preferred masks to those mugs." {n}Bluff's gestures vaguely at the crowd thronging the square below.{/n} "Besides... who would take the poor, wretched fool seriously? Who would suspect?"
"I have always preferred masks to those mugs." {n}Bluff gestures vaguely at the crowd thronging the square below.{/n} "Besides... who would take the poor, wretched fool seriously? Who would suspect?"

"It is simple. Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath the fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our…grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my tiny mischief…"

"It is simple: Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath this fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our... grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my little mischief..."

languages.text: “事情很简单，有谁会把这个可怜小丑的玩笑当真呢？又有谁愿意多看他一眼呢？只要躲在这顶小丑帽下面，我的双手就不受任何约束。我可以全心全意准备我们的……盛大谢幕，顺便掩盖我那些小小的恶作剧留下的痕迹……”
languages.original_text: "It is simple: Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath this fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our... grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my little mischief..."

traits.locale_text: “事情很简单，有谁会把这个可怜小丑的玩笑当真呢？又有谁愿意多看他一眼呢？只要躲在这顶小丑帽下面，我的双手就不受任何约束。我可以全心全意准备我们的……盛大谢幕，顺便掩盖我那些小小的恶作剧留下的痕迹……”

languages.text: «Es sencillo. ¿Quién iba a tomarse en serio a un pobre y miserable bufón? ¿Quién sospecharía de él? Bajo este gorro, mis manos eran libres de preparar este... gran final. Y de ocultar el rastro de mis travesuras...».
languages.original_text: "It is simple: Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath this fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our... grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my little mischief..."

traits.locale_text: «Es sencillo. ¿Quién iba a tomarse en serio a un pobre y miserable bufón? ¿Quién sospecharía de él? Bajo este gorro, mis manos eran libres de preparar este... gran final. Y de ocultar el rastro de mis travesuras...».

languages.text: "Çok basit... Kim zavallı, acınası bir soytarıyı ciddiye alır ki? Kim ona bakma lütfunu gösterir ki? Bu soytarı külahını takarken ellerim serbestti, kendimi tamamıyla büyük kapanışımıza hazırlanmaya adayabildim. Küçük yaramazlığımın izlerini gizlemek için de..."
languages.original_text: "It is simple: Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath this fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our... grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my little mischief..."

traits.locale_text: "Çok basit... Kim zavallı, acınası bir soytarıyı ciddiye alır ki? Kim ona bakma lütfunu gösterir ki? Bu soytarı külahını takarken ellerim serbestti, kendimi tamamıyla büyük kapanışımıza hazırlanmaya adayabildim. Küçük yaramazlığımın izlerini gizlemek için de..."

languages.text: 「俺はいつもこの間抜けたちに対しては仮面を着けるのが好きなんだ」{n}ブラフは下の広場に群がる群衆に曖昧な身振り手振りをする。{/n}「それに…一体誰が可哀想で哀れな道化の言うことを真剣に聞くだろう？誰が疑うだろう？」
languages.original_text: "I have always preferred masks to those mugs." {n}Bluff gestures vaguely at the crowd thronging the square below.{/n} "Besides... who would take the poor, wretched fool seriously? Who would suspect?"

traits.locale_text: 「俺はいつもこの間抜けたちに対しては仮面を着けるのが好きなんだ」{n}ブラフは下の広場に群がる群衆に曖昧な身振り手振りをする。{/n}「それに…一体誰が可哀想で哀れな道化の言うことを真剣に聞くだろう？誰が疑うだろう？」

languages.text: « C'est simple : qui prendrait au sérieux un pauvre et misérable bouffon ? Qui lui accorderait seulement un regard ? Ce chapeau me permettait de garder les mains libres. Je pouvais me dévouer entièrement aux préparatifs de notre... grand final. Et effacer les traces de mes petits méfaits... »
languages.original_text: "It is simple: Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath this fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our... grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my little mischief..."

traits.locale_text: « C'est simple : qui prendrait au sérieux un pauvre et misérable bouffon ? Qui lui accorderait seulement un regard ? Ce chapeau me permettait de garder les mains libres. Je pouvais me dévouer entièrement aux préparatifs de notre... grand final. Et effacer les traces de mes petits méfaits... »

languages.text: "Es ist ganz einfach: Wer würde schon einen armen, erbärmlichen Narren ernst nehmen? Wer würde ihn überhaupt eines Blickes würdigen? Unter dieser Narrenkappe waren meine Hände frei und ich konnte mich ganz unserem ... großen Finale widmen. Und der Verwischung der Spuren meiner kleinen Posse ..."
languages.original_text: "It is simple: Who would ever take a poor, pitiful jester seriously? Who would even spare him a glance? Beneath this fool's cap, my hands were free, and I could devote myself entirely to preparing for our... grand finale. And to conceal the tracks of my little mischief..."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ganz einfach: Wer würde schon einen armen, erbärmlichen Narren ernst nehmen? Wer würde ihn überhaupt eines Blickes würdigen? Unter dieser Narrenkappe waren meine Hände frei und ich konnte mich ganz unserem ... großen Finale widmen. Und der Verwischung der Spuren meiner kleinen Posse ..."
